Current student oversight of the Student Recreation Center

Ive been disappointed in lack of student oversight and would like to see more oversight on student dollars being spent PERIOD

Absolutely programs are competing with departments and contracts for funds PERIOD

Changes to student athletic ticket distribution

Student enthusiasm is more important than seniority PERIOD
